shortDescription: The wp-live-chat-support plugin before 8.0.27 for WordPress has XSS via the GDPR page.
vulnerabilityName: 3cx live_chat Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
